_sText:
ba_jail_sovietwave_beta3

MAP BY notfoundname
STEAM: STEAM_0:0:235566452
DISCORD: notfoundname#3292 (or just @notfoundname since they change it)

Any feedback and criticism is appreciated!
If you want to port this map, contact me!
For server owners: no need to compress it with bzip2 since it already is compressed.

СПАСИБО ДРУЗЬЯМ:
- Sovok
- pezdohryakich

СПАСИБО СООБЩЕСТВУ ЦЕНТРАЛЬНОЙ ТЮРЬМЫ:
- CEVAPCICI
- Цветик :D
- ВСЕМ АДМИНАМ
- И ОБЫЧНЫМ ИГРОКАМ!

Games/locations:
- 37 T and 10 CT spawns
- Disco with russian music and 9 colors game
- Swimming pool with underwater race
- Underground
- T got talent with piano to play on and guess the word
- Football
- Volleyball
- Jump rope
- Kitchen
- Boat game with 6 boats

Used assets:
- CS:S and HL2 stock and modified assets
- Modified water texture from gm_excess_construct
- Lenin statue: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2425675174
- Assets from https://modding-assets.net
- Swaying effect https://gamebanana.com/tuts/12924
- Old soviet propaganda

Songs:
- Bi-2 - Polkovniku Nikto Ne Pishet
- Kino - Peremen
- Alyans - Na zare
- Agata Kristi - Na Voyne
- Kino - Konchitsya Leto
- Lumina Solis - Pech Goryachya, A Za Oknom Metel Metyot
- Mayak - Reka
